subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Toronto played its first home playoff game since 2004, but Boston got an outstanding performance from goalie Tuukka Rask and took a 2-1 lead in the series.
snippet: Toronto played its first home playoff game since 2004, but Boston got an outstanding performance from goalie Tuukka Rask and took a 2-1 lead in the series.
